summary:
NOW EVEN POOR PEOPLE CAN FIGHT!!!
Its a Wooden stick used as a sword.
descriptionHtml:
*UPDATE* I\'m not continuing unless i get some Endorsements *UPDATE*
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ARE YOU A HOBO?
YOU DONT HAVE ENOUGH ITEMS TO CRAFT A WEAPON?
THAN THIS IS THE PERFECT MOD FOR YOU!
DOWNLOAD NOW AND CRAFT IT FOR ONLY 3 FIREWOOD AND 2 LEATHER STRIPS!!!

This is my very first mod that i would like to share.
Its a stick made of wood, just like you find in real life.
May the wood be with you.

*NOTE* I am not available upcoming weeks, school....DAMNIT... *NOTE*

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 HOW TO USE:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Open the console by pressing the \"~\" key
2. Type: \"help woodenstick 0\" and hit ENTER
3. Look at the \"WEAP\" | \"Woodenstick\" | \"ID,Of,Item\"
5. Type: \"Player.placeatme ID,Of,Item,Shown,Above\" and hit ENTER
4. Leave the console by pressing the \"~\" key
5. Pick up the stick that dropped near you

OR

1. Go to a forge.
2. Craft it for 3 firewood and 2 Leather Strips. 
*NOTE* Its under the Daedric Smithing tab *NOTE*

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                    STATS:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type:                                  Sword
Damage per second:              10
Weight:                               1
Value:                                 1

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                   INSTALLATION:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Open or Extract the .zip file
2. Open your skyrim data folder
    *Default: C://Program Files/Steam/Steamapps/Skyrim/Data/*
3. Move the files in the opened skyrim data folder
4. If it asks to merge the files click: YES
5. Launch Skyrim
6. Click \"DATA FILES\" at the launcher
7. Make sure you checked \"woodenstick.esp\"
8. Launch the game
9. Spawn the weapon (read: ^HOW TO USE^)

OR

1. Open Nexus Mod Manager
2. Go to the MODS tab
3. Double click woodenstick.esp
4. Make sure woodenstick is checked
5. Play game!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CHANGELOG:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
V1.0:       First release
V1.2:       No sword drawing sound + Blood bug fix + Hit distance from 1 to 1.5

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                     BUGS/ISSUES:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. There\'s an issue with the model, making a small spot invisible (^Image^) (Fixed in V1.5 BETA)
2. While crafting it is under the Daedric tab (Fixed in V1.5 BETA)
3. A bit un-woody looking texture (this is ONLY in V1.5 BETA so it is NOT in --> V1.2)
*NOTE* If you find more bugs please message me *NOTE*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                         MORE INFORMATION:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Endorse the file if you like it, i would really appreciate that.
More endoresements = More motivation to update / mod more!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                       CREDITS:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bethesda:      For making skyrim, and the Creation Kit
Gilianneke:     For the whole add-on
Ghosu:           For the incredible tutorials/help and time spend/given to me!! THANK YOU MAN, YOU ROCK!
author: Gilianneke
